snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda GBC - Beta v0.23 (Windows & Linux)
snippet.description:
Download(s) OneDrive:
Windows: https://1drv.ms/u/s!Antze46_KH6j60u47FR0ranKlKqb?e=YdS4sh
Linux: https://1drv.ms/u/s!Antze46_KH6j60w_whLmgsV_-oey?e=jMle4t

Beta v0.23 Changes
------------------
Simplified drops (10th Enemy has the Bomb).
Drops recycle through 052A*/0050 from NES LoZ.
Ghini Minions now have their own drop rates.
Fixed an issue when picking up a Blue rupee at 0 rupees.

Beta v0.22 Changes
------------------
Up, up, up the mountain fixed from Area 29.
Zola spawn/despawn speed adjusted.

Beta v0.21 Changes
------------------
Overworld completely populated.
More positional options for enemy spawns added.
Charged sword when entering area fixed.
Triforce acquired and Level-1 entrance glitch fixed.
Player no longer takes damage when enemies are in frozen state (Boomerang).
Player no longer takes damage when enemies are in hurt state.
In Level save fixed.
Cactus damage added.
Added semi-transparency to Ghini and Ghini Minions.
Ladder and Raft added for testing.
